tool_description: Checks organizational and legal retention policies to determine minimum retention periods and exceptions for customer data deletion requests.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for retention policy checking

data_categories.description: Data categories to check against retention policies

account_status.description: Current account status: active, inactive, or closed

error_messages: Unknown jurisdiction: The specified jurisdiction is not supported or recognized.
Policy lookup failed: Unable to retrieve retention policies for specified parameters.
Invalid account status: Use one of [active, inactive, closed].
Data category not found: One or more data categories are not recognized in retention policies.
usage: Provide customer_id, data_categories for policy checking, jurisdiction for legal requirements, and current account_status. Returns detailed retention requirements and minimum periods.

minimum_retention_days.description: Minimum number of days data must be retained

retention_exceptions.description: Data categories with special retention requirements

deletion_eligible.description: Whether data is eligible for immediate deletion
